Miễn phí! Bạn có thể tạo, lưu trữ và gửi: Free of charge! You can create, host, and submit all pages for free for life. Vesey's income only comes from deducting a small part (4.9%) of the wedding favors through the system. This fee is only equivalent to the cost of printing a high-end paper card.
Mình có thể tạo được nhiều trang web cướ: Can I create multiple wedding websites on Fist
Đúng vậy! Bạn có thể tạo nhiều “website”: That's right! You can create multiple “websites” with separate links to send out to different groups of guests. In addition, for each 'website', you can also create separate links solemnly for each close guest.
Pháp luật Việt Nam bảo vệ! Vesey và bạn: Vietnamese law protected! Vesey and you sign a full legal contract (at Dashboard), clearly stating the rights and responsibilities of the parties. Vesey Joint Stock Company has business registration and fully fulfills its tax obligations, operates completely within the framework of Vietnamese law.
Tiền mừng cưới không bị thu thuế! Theo t: Wedding money is not taxed! According to Circular 111/2013/TT-BTC of the Ministry of Finance, wedding favors are not taxable income. In terms of tax, there is no difference when receiving wedding greetings in cash or through online payment gateways.
